column1: #text=First we began by going to the orchard and picking the best tree we could find , this however did not satisfy the little ones so we had to go with the tree that they picked out .
#text=We drove back home with the tree on top of the car to begin the planting .
#text=Starting off I dug a medium sized hole where we could plant the tree and it could grow as much as it wanted .
#text=We fertilized the ground where the tree would be planted and began the transfer of the tree .
#text=This tree was then checked daily on its progress and to be watered .
#text=The tree 's health was a priority of our family and we kept it in spectacular condition .
#text=This tree now stands tall over our house to protect it from the sun and allow us the shade we need when we would like to play outside .
#text=This tree is the foundation of our family and we use it to show our togetherness .
